channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP SE -- SAP HANA Extended Application Services
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP SE -- SAP HANA Extended Application Services

item.title: CVE-2019-0277|2024-08-04T17:44:16.319Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20hana%20extended%20application%20services
item.description: SAP HANA extended application services, version 1, advanced does not sufficiently validate an XML document accepted from an authenticated developer with privileges to the SAP space (XML External Entity vulnerability).

item.title: CVE-2019-0363|2024-08-04T17:44:16.529Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20hana%20extended%20application%20services
item.description: Attackers may misuse an HTTP/REST endpoint of SAP HANA Extended Application Services (Advanced model), before version 1.0.118, to overload the server or retrieve information about internal network ports.

item.title: CVE-2019-0261|2024-08-04T17:44:16.376Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20hana%20extended%20application%20services
item.description: Under certain circumstances, SAP HANA Extended Application Services, advanced model (XS advanced) does not perform authentication checks properly for XS advanced platform and business users. Fixed in 1.0.97 to 1.0.99 (running on SAP HANA 1 or SAP HANA 2 SPS0 (second S stands for stack)).

item.title: CVE-2019-0364|2024-08-04T17:44:16.544Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20hana%20extended%20application%20services
item.description: Attackers may misuse an HTTP/REST endpoint of SAP HANA Extended Application Services (Advanced model), before version 1.0.118, to enumerate open ports.
